full_summary:
# Harbour Development at Lark Harbour, NL 

**Title**: ITQ-F6140-240233-Harbour Development – Lark Harbour, NL

**Reference Number**: WS4689902852-Doc4689924711

**Publication Date**: 2024-07-17

**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-08-02T14:00:00

### Information

* **Language**: The tender documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Newfoundland and Labrador (Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador).
* **Regions of Delivery**: Newfoundland and Labrador (Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador).
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)/ Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC).

### Tender Requirements

This is the **first phase (Phase One)** of a two-phase process:

* **Evaluation Criteria**: The qualifications of all interested suppliers will be evaluated based on their suitability and experience for this project.
* **Pre-Qualification**: Suppliers will not be invited to the financial bid phase if they do not meet the minimum qualification requirements.

The **scope of work** includes furnishing all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials for the harbour development at Lark Harbour, Newfoundland and Labrador, in strict accordance with the specifications and accompanying drawings. The contractor shall perform and complete the work within 130 weeks of contract award.

**Estimated Cost**: The estimated cost for this opportunity is between $5,000,001 to $20,000,000 (HST included).

### Notice

The notice for this tender opportunity can be accessed at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20350485?extsite=MjAzNTA0ODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Trade Agreements

This tender opportunity is eligible for various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
